page.title: 15TRANSPORT
page.content: {A556}crosses the area following the line of Roman Watling Street and now forms a link between Chester to the SW and Manchester to the NE. It also links with{M6}at Tabley 2km. NE of area covered. {M56}and{M63/63}are easily accessible from Mid-Cheshire. {A559}cuts across the SW corner of the area in the line of the Warrington - London turnpike. {B5391}crosses from Wincham to Tabley via Pickmere. There is an extensive network of unclassified roads following the line of field boundaries. {Bus services}(Crossville) are infrequent and do not run on Sundays. {Local trains}- Manchester to Chester via Northwich call at Plumley and Lostock stations just outside area. {Main line services}from Hartford (8km) or Crewe (25km)
